translations: adj.高出地面的，比（他物）高的；高尚的，睿智的；职位（或社会地位）高的；偏高的，高于正常的；欢欣的
v.提拔，晋升；举起，抬起；提高，使升高（elevate 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 高温；升高温度，提高温度

sentences.sentence: He was elevated to the post of president.
sentences.translation: 他被提拔到总裁的职位。

sentences.sentence: He elevated many of his friends to powerful positions within the government.
sentences.translation: 他将许多朋友都提拔到政府部门的要职上。

sentences.sentence: She has elevated the dinner party into an art form.
sentences.translation: 她把宴会办得犹如一种艺术。
